I.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rek'Sai''' [[basic attack]]s and ability hits generate {{tip|fury|{{as|25 Fury}}}}, which expires by {{as|20 Fury}} per second after 5 seconds without generating {{as|Fury}}. ''{{ai|Prey Seeker|Rek'Sai}}'' will not generate {{as|Fury}} against non-{{tip|champions}}.

When '''Rek'sai''' becomes {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}}}}, she consumes her current {{as|Fury}} over 3 seconds to {{tip|heal}} for up to {{pp|20 to 190}} at {{as|100 Fury}}, stopping once fully consumed or she reaches {{sti|health|{{as|full health}}}}. If she starts generating {{as|Fury}} while {{sbc|Burrowed}}, the consumption occurs after 5 seconds.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Rek'Sai basic attacks and ability hits generate 25 Fury, which expires by 20 Fury per second after 5 seconds without generating Fury. Rek'Sai's Prey Seeker will not generate Fury against non-champions.
When Rek'sai becomes Rek'Sai's Burrowed, she consumes her current Fury over 3 seconds to heal for up to 20 − 190 (based on level) at 100 Fury, stopping once fully consumed or she reaches full health. If she starts generating Fury while Burrowed, the consumption occurs after 5 seconds.
I.notes:
* {{tip|Fury}} bar changes from {{color|yellow|'''Yellow'''}} to {{color|red|'''Red'''}} when full.
* When '''Rek'Sai''' automatically consumes {{as|Fury}} while {{sbc|Burrowed}} (no transformation), the healing buff will refresh every second while she has/maintains over {{as|25 Fury}}.{{bug|2}} This causes the healing to last 6 seconds at {{as|100 Fury}}.

Q1.name: Queen's Wrath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rek'Sai's''' next three basic attacks within 5 seconds have a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time and deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to the target and surrounding enemies. The damage to the primary target is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
''Queen's Wrath'' ends prematurely and goes on cooldown if '''Rek'Sai''' is ''{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}}'' for more than {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Queen's Wrath'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Rek'Sai's''' basic attack timer.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rek'Sai's next three basic attacks within 5 seconds have a 0.25-second cast time and deal bonus physical damage to the target and surrounding enemies. The damage to the primary target is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Queen's Wrath ends prematurely and goes on cooldown if Rek'Sai is Rek'Sai's Burrowed for more than 1.5 seconds.
Queen's Wrath resets Rek'Sai's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|21 to 45}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|21*3 to 45*3}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
Q1.notes:
* Damage to the primary target applies {{tip|proc damage}} and damage to secondary targets applies {{tip|default damage}}.
* ''Queen's Wrath's'' bonus damage applies against [[structures]].
* There is a brief delay between each attack of ''Queen's Fury'' after the attack's cast time elapses.
** If '''Rek'Sai''' has more than {{as|{{fd|1.4}} attack speed}}, she can cancel this delay to perform the next attack quicker. This does not occur if she is {{tip|acquisition radius|attacking automatically}}.
* ''Queen's Wrath's'' enhanced attacks still apply [[on-hit]] and [[on-attack]] effects and [[life steal]] to the primary target.
* When {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, the damage dealt to the primary target is nullified; however, damage to any secondary targets still occurs.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Queen's Wrath'' interactions with {{tip|block|blocking}} and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.
* If the primary target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, {{tip|death|dies}}, or is too far away or no longer in {{tip|sight}} during the empowered attack's cast time, it is cancelled but not consumed.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 150% bonus AD)

Q2.name: Prey Seeker
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' fires a void bolt in the target direction that detonates on the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
Q2.descriptionHtml: Active: Rek'Sai fires a void bolt in the target direction that detonates on the first enemy hit, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and revealing them for 2.5 seconds.
Q2.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* ''Prey Seeker's'' effect radius is centered around the location of the missile as it collides.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 70% AP)

W1.name: Burrow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' becomes {{sbc|Burrowed}}, reducing her {{sti|attack range}}{{ft|to 75|by 100}}and her {{tip|sight}} radius to 250 units while gaining access to her {{sbc|Burrowed}} abilities. She also becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and gains {{pp|15 to 30 for 4|1 to 16|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, as well as ''Tremor Sense''.
{{sbc|Tremor Sense:}} '''Rek'Sai''' and her allies gain {{tip|obscured vision}} of nearby enemy units that are moving every {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
Once ''Burrow'' has been learned, '''Rek'Sai''' automatically becomes {{sbc|Burrowed}} upon completing a {{si|Recall}} channel or [[death|respawning]].
W1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rek'Sai becomes Burrowed, reducing her attack rangeand her sight radius to 250 units while gaining access to her Burrowed abilities. She also becomes ghosted and gains 1 to 16 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed, as well as Tremor Sense.
Tremor Sense: Rek'Sai and her allies gain obscured vision of nearby enemy units that are moving every 1.5 seconds.
Once Burrow has been learned, Rek'Sai automatically becomes Burrowed upon completing a Recall channel or death.
W1.notes:
*''Burrow'' does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* Enemies detected by ''Tremor Sense'' are displayed as rings on the ground. Champions display larger rings and '''Rek'Sai''' will react to this detection.
* Visible enemies will not be detected by Tremor Sense. Enemies standing still while '''Rek'Sai''' is nearby are insensible by ''Tremor Sense''.
[[File:Rek'Sai_Ring_Screenshot.jpg|thumb|left|300px|'''Rek'Sai''' sensing a nearby enemy with ''Tremor Sense''.]]

W2.name: Unburrow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' becomes {{sbc|Un-Burrowed}}, gaining access to her {{sbc|Un-Burrowed}} abilities. Additionally, she deals {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocks them aside}}. The enemy closest to the center is instead {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second, and cannot be affected again by ''Unburrow'' for some time.
'''Rek'Sai''' can also trigger ''Unburrow'' by issuing an attack command, applying the {{tip|airborne|knock up}} against the target.
W2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rek'Sai becomes Un-Burrowed, gaining access to her Un-Burrowed abilities. Additionally, she deals physical damage to nearby enemies and knocks them aside. The enemy closest to the center is instead knocked up for 1 second, and cannot be affected again by Unburrow for some time.
Rek'Sai can also trigger Unburrow by issuing an attack command, applying the knock up against the target.
W2.notes:
*''Unburrow'' does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Unburrow's'' per-target {{sti|cooldown}} only applies to targets affected by the {{tip|airborne|knock-up}}, but provides immunity to all effects of the ability.
* ''Unburrow'' is still considered an ability and is thus stopped by {{tip|silence}}. She can basic attack normally during this time, without leaving ''unburrow''.
* For a brief moment during the beginning animation of {{ai|Tunnel|Rek'Sai|Tunnel}}, '''Rek'Sai''' can trigger ''Unburrow'' by issuing an attack command.

E1.name: Furious Bite
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' bites the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
At maximum {{tip|fury|{{as|Fury}}}}, ''Furious Bite's'' damage is doubled and converted to {{sti|{{as|true damage}}}}.
E1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rek'Sai bites the target enemy, dealing physical damage.
At maximum Fury, Furious Bite's damage is doubled and converted to true damage.

E2.name: Tunnel
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, leaving behind a ''Tunnel'' with two interconnected entrances that lasts up to 10 minutes. The ''Tunnel'' can be traversed again when '''Rek'Sai''' targets either entrance, shutting down the ''Tunnel'' for a few seconds.

'''Rek'Sai''' can have up to 8 ''Tunnels'' active on the map at once, deploying beyond the maximum destroys the oldest one. Enemy {{tip|champions}} can destroy a ''Tunnel'' by standing on either entrance for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, granting them {{g|5}} upon successfully destroying the ''Tunnel''.

An {{sbc|Un-Burrowed}} '''Rek'Sai''' will automatically ''{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai}}'' before entering the ''Tunnel'' and automatically ''{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai}}'' after exiting it. This does not put ''{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai}}'' on cooldown nor trigger ''{{ai|Fury of the Xer'Sai|Rek'Sai}}'', but does trigger other ''Burrow'' effects and ''{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai}}''.
'''Rek'Sai''' cannot enter a tunnel while {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}, {{tip|ground|grounded}}, or {{tip|silence|silenced}}.
E2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rek'Sai dashes in the target direction, leaving behind a Tunnel with two interconnected entrances that lasts up to 10 minutes. The Tunnel can be traversed again when Rek'Sai targets either entrance, shutting down the Tunnel for a few seconds.
Rek'Sai can have up to 8 Tunnels active on the map at once, deploying beyond the maximum destroys the oldest one. Enemy champions can destroy a Tunnel by standing on either entrance for 1.5 seconds, granting them 5 upon successfully destroying the Tunnel.
An Un-Burrowed Rek'Sai will automatically Rek'Sai's Burrow before entering the Tunnel and automatically Rek'Sai's Unburrow after exiting it. This does not put Rek'Sai's Burrow on cooldown nor trigger Rek'Sai's Fury of the Xer'Sai, but does trigger other Burrow effects and Rek'Sai's Unburrow.
Rek'Sai cannot enter a tunnel while immobilized, grounded, or silenced.
E2.notes:
* Creating a ''Tunnel'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the area at the other end for 2 seconds.
* ''Tunnel'' entrances can be targeted by allied movement abilities (ex: ''{{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}'', ''{{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}'', ''{{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}'', ''{{si|Teleport}}'').
* ''Tunnel'' entrances are {{tip|sight|visible}} on allied champions' minimaps, while enemies must first gain {{tip|sight}} of one before it becomes visible on theirs (the opposite entrance is not revealed).
* Destroying a ''Tunnel'' while '''Rek'Sai''' is traversing it will not prevent her from reaching the opposite entrance.
* '''Rek'Sai''' can ''Tunnel'' through terrain if she dashes close to them and the wall is thin enough to allow the opposite entrance to spawn on the other side.

R.name: Void Rush
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rek'Sai''' applies ''Marked as Prey'' to enemy champions she damages, lasting 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' selects the target ''Marked as Prey'', becoming {{tip|displacement immune}} and {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} and {{tip|vanish|vanishing}} into the ground. After {{fd|1.5}} seconds, she becomes targetable again and emerges from the ground {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Un-Burrowed}}}} near the target and {{tip|dash|pounces}} at them, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|dash|dashing}} 125 units through them.

''The damage can be dodged if the target moves {{tt|1000|pending for confirmation}} or more units away. If the target dies or is too far away before '''Rek'Sai''' vanishes, Void Rush is canceled with a {{sti|cd|10-second}} cooldown.''
R.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Rek'Sai applies Marked as Prey to enemy champions she damages, lasting 5 seconds.
Active: Rek'Sai selects the target Marked as Prey, becoming displacement immune and unable to act and vanishing into the ground. After 1.5 seconds, she becomes targetable again and emerges from the ground Rek'Sai's Un-Burrowed near the target and pounces at them, dealing physical damage and dashing 125 units through them.
The damage can be dodged if the target moves 1000 or more units away. If the target dies or is too far away before Rek'Sai vanishes, Void Rush is canceled with a 10-second cooldown.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 400}} {{as|(+ 175% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20 to 30}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
R.notes:
* '''Rek'Sai''' will track the target if they change locations.
** She will dash through the target's previous location without dealing damage if the target is too far away or moves beyond {{tt|1750|Estimated}} units.
* All sources of damage by '''Rek'Sai''' count for applying the mark.
* ''Void Rush'' has a brief cast time during which '''Rek'Sai''' is still targetable.
* ''Void Rush's'' {{tip|displacement immunity}} begins from the start of the cast time, and ends when the dash ends.
* ''Void Rush's'' damage can be dodged by becoming {{tip|untargetable}}.
* '''Rek'Sai''' can activate ''Void Rush'' while {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} or {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}}.
** She will always emerge as ''Unburrowed''.
* If '''Rek'Sai''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} during the cast time, ''Void Rush'' is canceled and goes on a 10 second cooldown.
** If the ''resurrection'' occurs while {{tip|vanish|vanished}}, she will emerge and pounce the target immediately.
* A screeching noise made by '''Rek'Sai''' can be heard globally after ''Void Rush'' is cast (''will be heard by enemies even if they don't have {{tip|sight}} of '''Rek'Sai''' and/or her destination'').
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Rek'Sai''' is performing ''Void Rush'':
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=false|interrupts=death}}
{{ct|cast|spells=false}}

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 175% bonus AD) (+ % of target's missing health)

st_slices: (+ 175% bonus AD) (+ % of target's missing health)
